org.cloudgraph.hbase.io

Interface DistributedOperation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistributedReader, DistributedWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedGraphReader, DistributedGraphWriter

    public interface DistributedOperation
    Encapsulates one or more graph table operation components for federation across multiple physical tables and/or physical table rows.
    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
    See Also:
    GraphTableReader, GraphTableWriter, GraphTable
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StateMarshalingContext getMarshallingContext()
      Returns the marshalling context for this operation.
      boolean hasSingleRootType()
      Returns true if only one table operation exists with only one associated (root) type for this operation.

    • Method Detail

      • hasSingleRootType

        boolean hasSingleRootType()
        Returns true if only one table operation exists with only one associated (root) type for this operation.

        Note: because there may be a single root type within an operational context, this does not mean there is no federation involved. A type is a metadata entity, and there may be many (data object) instances of the type within a graph operation.

        Returns:
        true if only one table operation exists with only one associated (root) type for this operation.

      • getMarshallingContext

        StateMarshalingContext getMarshallingContext()
        Returns the marshalling context for this operation.
        Returns:
        the marshalling context for this operation
